name: Omni Magic!
description:
All characters are above 18 years old.


[Story]

The Kingdom of Elaire was blessed by the Goddess and protected from monsters.
People of Elaire enjoyed peaceful lives and the memory of war was fading.

One day, "Royal Treasure" was stolen from the vault of the castle.
Since the incident, monsters started spawning all around the Kingdom.

To solve the issue, the King gathered adventurers from all over the world, appointing them to be "investigators".
Their mission was to research monsters and bring the treasure back.
The King promised to grant one wish of an investigator who solved the issue......


[Heroine]

Anemone Anemony

The naive and clumsy girl aspires to be an investigator.
Her skill, "Omni Magic" used items to cast powerful magics.
She always wanted to become the sidekick magician of a strong hero, but she is not so confident yet.

The people of the town seem to teach the innocent girl false information.
Her adventure to bring back the Royal Treasure starts here.



[Game System]

As an investigator, search for clues to find the treasure by taking quests to defeat monsters!

1. Gather some information about monsters to use effective "Omni Magic".

2. Based on the information you gathered, collect the items which could be used for the magic.
Items can be found by exploring the town or by offering something naughty to people.

3. When you are ready, let's head to the quest!
In order to spot the monsters, you need to choose what to do based on the information you gathered.

4. When you encounter the monsters, defeat them with magic!
A frail girl swinging her wand would not inflict any damage on the monsters...
Find a weak spot of the monster, and choose items to cast an effective "Omni Magic"!
If you lose, the monsters will have no mercy on Anemone.
